File libsrc/libgmethod/Offset.c

Public Function Index

new_Offset (double)
Create an Offset object.
Offset_methodCreate (const char *)
Offset_addMethod ()
Register the Offset as a readable GMethod.

Public Functions

new_Offset 
 Offset new_Offset(double value)
Create an Offset object. Offset is a GMethod object that adds a constant value to a waveform's data.

Parameters:
value - the input offset.
Returns:
an Offset object, or NULL if malloc fails (logErrorMsg will be called)
Offset_methodCreate 
 GMethod Offset_methodCreate(const char *s)
Offset_addMethod 
 void Offset_addMethod()
Register the Offset as a readable GMethod. This routine should be called once before an Offset is read from a file.
